inn1.comm: Lee starts off with a loosner, 137 kmh, banged in short outside off stump and Vincent decides it's too wide to play a shot at
New Zealand are away, short of a length outside off stump, Vincent opens the face and runs it through gully for a single
good length ball on off and middle, bending back into Fleming who comes forward and defends on the leg side, that ball hit high on the bat, near the handle almost

full ball on middle stump, Fleming gets half forward and tries to flick, he closes the face too early and gets a leading edge that flies over point, that could have gone anywhere but it fell safe, two runs in streaky fashion
good length and fast outside off stump, Fleming lets  it go
short of  a length on middle and leg stump, Fleming moves across and plays it behind square for  a single
short of a length on middle and off stump, Fleming defends on the back foot towards cover, that was 153 kmh
fuller length on off stump, Fleming gets half forward and pushes it to point
153 kmh again but it's short and wide outside off stump, Fleming gets forward, latches on to the length, gets on top of the bounce and lashes it through cover point for four
fuller length on off stump, defended on the front foot to the off side
short of a length but Tait again drags it wide outside off stump, Fleming plays it in front of point for a single
153.1 kmh this time, pitches just outside off stump and hardly bounces, Vincent lets it go through to Gilchrist
good length on off stump, Fleming pushes it in front of covers for a single
good length ball pitching on off stump and angling into middle, Vincent gets behind the line and defends
fuller length on off stump, Vincent gets forward and defends to Clarke at cover point
147 kmh from Lee and he over-steps this time, Voincent lets it go wide outside the off stump
fuller length on off and middle, Vincent uses the angling into him to dab it to mid-on for a quick single
Lee strikes! Short of a length ball on off stump, angling away from Fleming who drives on the up, he can't keep the drive along the ground and ends up hitting it straight to Hussey at mid-off
pitches wide outside off stump and moves away from the right-hander, wide called
hits a good length outside off stump and moves away from fulton  who lets it go, Gilchrist collected that near his boot, not much bounce on the pitch
Tait proves me wrong! He fires in a fast and striaght bouncer at 153 kmh, Vincent just about manages to avoid it
full and fast, an incredible 157 kmh and Vincent was completely beaten for pace, he tried to flick but got hit on the pad, Tait appeals for lbw but it was slipping down leg
full and quick again, 154 kmh, Tait is really firing it into Vincent, who gets hit on the pad again, beaten for pace
Wow! 160 k per hour. That one was really furious. Wonder what he ate for the breakfast. Full, swinging in and drifts on to pads. Obviously, beaten for pace
crack! Overpitched and width outside off, creamed through covers.
fullish, defended to mid-off
this time pushed out to cover
full, fast, around the off stump, Fulton leans forward and drives to mid-off
dabbed to the on side and off they go for a run
Swing and a miss. Full and just outside off, Vincent wants to send it out of Melbourne but ....
dabbed to backward point and Vincent will retain the strike
153.4 k, fullish, outside off, Vincent tries to drive it through covers, goes hard at it and the ball takes the inside edge and runs off to square leg
Pace is fine but you got to direct it well. This one slides in on to the legs, flicked past square leg
155.5k, on a length, around off and middle, Fulton stands tall, punches it out to cover regioin
155.1 k, banged in short and Fulton sways away from that one.
whistles through at 155.1 k in the channel outside off, Fulton lets it go through
153.1 k, consistently hurling the ball at furious pace, this one settles in on the middle, driven to midon
full ball, a rank half-volley on the pads, Vincent plays a superb flick, took it right off his toes and although it was in the air, the ball flew wide of Hodge at midwicket and ran to the fence
flicked once more off his pads, behind square this time for a single
good length ball outside the off stump, Fulton stands tall and punches wide of mid-off, Hussey gives chase
good length ball on off stump, Vincent pushes hard at it and gets a thick outside edge past point for one
good length ball on off stump, angling into Fulton who gets well forward and blocks with a straight bat
short of a length on off stump, Fulton plays back this time and defends to point
full length on the pads, Vincent tries to flick it but perhaps tried to hit it a touch too hard, he misses and the ball thuds into his pad
defended on the off side on the front foot
good length ball just outside off stump, Vincent gets on to the front foot and defends to Clarke at point

short of  a length outside off stump, Vincent tries to cut but the ball was to close to the body, he gets beaten, perhaps by the lack of pace after facing Tait who was consistently in the mid-150s, Clark is 123 kmh
defended on the back foot back to the bowler
good length just outside off stump, Vincent moves forward and across outside off stump and defends
short of a length outside off stump, Fulton cuts down to third man for a single
defended on the front foot in front of point, Vincent thinks about the single and decides against it
guided to third man with an open face for a single
a fraction short and Fulton moves back quickly and pulls to deep square leg
short of  a length on off stump, Vincent gets on the back foot and takes a single to point
full outside off stump, Fulton gets forward and gives the half-colley a thump, White fields it on the bounce at short cover
good length ball in the channel outside off stump, played down to third man for a single
a fraction short outside off stump, Fulton rocks back in a flash and pulls wide of the man at mid-on, he didn't time that well but will get two for his effort
good length again outside off stump, that's the Clark length, Fulton gets forward and defends to cover
short of  a length this time, Fulton stands on the back foot and opens the face to play it wide of Ponting at backward point
short of  a length outside off stump, Vincent backs away and flat-bats it to cover, he didn't time it well and didn't find the palcement either
fuller length and Vincent goes the ariel route, he moves on the front foot and lofts over cover, once again he didn't time it well enough but the intent was very aggressive
full and very wide outside off stump, angling away from the right-hander, Vincent lets it go
this time he doesn't let it go, he throws his arms at a full and wide ball and lashes it over backward point for two more
defended to point on the front foot
full and wide outside off stump, Vincent gets down on one knee and flays at it, he gets beaten by the seam movement away from him
smash! Johnson bowls that a bit fuller and much straighter, Vincent opens up his stance and bashes it over midwicket for four
cheeky cheeky! fuller length on middle and leg, Vincent moves across and plays a pick-up shot in the air and down to the fine leg fence, outstanding improvisation
good length ball on off and middle, angling into the right-hander, Fulton gets forward and defends to midwicket
a touch too short outside off stump, Fulton muscles it over midwicket for four more, that's three fours in a row now
defended on the front foot on the off side
good length on off stump, Fulton gets behind the line and defends to cover
a touch fuller on off stump, Fulton plants his front foot forward and drives to cover
excellent come back from Clark, he finishes the over with a good length ball on off stump that Fulton defends to cover
147.9 kmh, hits a good length outside off stump, Vincent tries to cut but it's too close to him
short of a length delivery outside off stump, Vincent tries to cut on the back foot but the bounce beats him
how did that miss? Tait fires in the yorker at 150 kmh, it swung back into Vincent as well who was beaten for pace, that missed the off stump by a hair's breadth
full on the pads, Vincent tries to flick but misses, the ball hits the pad for a leg bye behind square
fuller length on off and middle, Fulton drives back to Tait on the front foot
good length ball on off stump, Fulton gets forward and defends bacl to Tait, he begins his second spell with a maiden
short of a length on off and middle, Vincent steps out and tries to pull to deep square legbut doesn;t make contact, there is a man in the deep for that shot
good length ball on off stump, Vincent defends to point
good length ball and Vincent backs away, trying to make room and aims the hit over cover, he gets a thick edge down to Lee at third man
Fulton gets forward and lifts a fullish ball on middle stump over mid-on, superb timing and he gets four
defended on the front foot towards point, these two have now added 50 in really quick time
the yorker, swinging into leg stump, Fulton tries to flick but misses and gets hit on the pad
short of a length and outside off stump, Vincent makes room and tries to slash it through the off side but gets beaten for pace
Ouch! Tait digs it in short at 153kmh, Vincent tries to duck out of the way, the ball hardly rose as much as Vincent expected and thudded into his back
short of a length again and Fulton tries to pull, the ball skids on him and goes under the bottom edge
short of a length on middle and leg, Fulton whips it off his pads to short fine leg
full ball swinging into the pads, Fulton misses the flick and collects a run to midwicket
fuller length on off and middle, Vincent stays rooted to his crease and plays the square drive, he hit that nicely but doesn't find the gap at cover point
short of length, outside off stump, punched towards cover
slightly slower, was short, Fulton goes through with his pull shot, bit too early into the stroke and the ball just bobs over the stumps , one bounce into Gilchrist's gloves
low full toss, down the leg side, Fulton attempts to flick itl and it runs away off the pads to fine leg
banged in short and it sails down leg side.
beaten! In the zone outside off, Vincent flirts at it but doesn't get a favourable response. The story of my life
this time the wood meets the leather but at the toe end as Vincent tries to cut a short and wide delivery and the ball bobs over cover region, out to the man in deep
right away over 150. in fact 152+ on the middle stump line, Vincent gets right behind the line and defends solidly
150.7k, fuller and on the middle, driven back to the bowler, Tait stretches his hand  and makes the stop
must be a slower one. Just 145 k per hour! fullish outside off, driven powerfully but straight to cover
149.3 k, on a length, just outside off, Vincent taps it close on the off side and runs with the stroke
148.2, fullish, on middle and leg, Fulton doesn't quite lean forward, flicks it uppishly, and bisects midwicket and mid on,
pushed out to cover region.
144.4 k, on a length, around off stump, punched back down the track, Lee makes a smart stop
142.4k, some 10k slower than Tait, around off stump, defended on the front foot
140.2 k around off, Fulton nudges it towards extra cover and takes off for a quick run. Ponting swoops in, hurls in a throw but misses. That's a rare event.
Bosh! What a strike! lee's fastest in this over, 145 k has been sent screaming over long off. Vincent took his left leg outside the line and just went through with the shot.
Boom! And this one crashes into the midwicket fence. 144k,not all that short but Vincent manages to swing it over midwicket. Cracker of a stroke
Ah! good response. Lee cranks up the pace, 149k, full and swinging in late and Vincent is rapped on the pads as he tries to work it to on side
149.5 k, fullish, almost at the blockhole, on the off stump line, jabbed away to mid-off
similar pace, similar length but this one was outside off, Vincent has no time to move his feet, just tries to reach out for it, the bat touches the ground, the ball stings Gilchrist's gloves
run down to thirdman region
149.8k , full and on the middle and leg, Fulton picks it up nicely, over square leg. Carl Hooperish in style there.
Tait keeps pinging the full length, this time nudged to wide mid-on
another full-pitched stuff has been drilled to Ponting at extra cover
Biffed! 138.7 k , short of length, on the middle and leg, Fulton pulls it behind square leg. Imperious.
tip and run. nudged towards mid-on and he runs with the stroke.
127.5 k, overpitched outside off, driven to long off.
beaten! 141 k, angling away in the zone outside off, Fulton has a lame poke at it, only meets thin air
138k, on the middle stump line, Fulton punches at it, the ball was in the air briefly and it rolls over between mid on and midwicket
streaky! Fullish, outside off, Vincent clears the bin, throws his bat at it and it runs down to thirdman region
overpitched, 139 k , on the off stump, Fulton places it to right of mid-off and rushes across for a quick single

Vincent's third consecutive fifty. Ever since he has replaced Astle, he has been on fire. With bat and mouth! and he has walked the talk. Fab performance. 144.5 k attempted yorker, Vincent takes his left foot outside the line, punches it to long on for a single
down the leg side
149.4 k , fullish, middle and leg, worked to midwicket
attempted yorker turns into low full toss, on the middle stump line, worked to midwicket again.
change of pace. 101.1 k per hour, on the off stump line, driven to the off side
banged in short, at the body, Fulton is cramped up slightly, manages to pull it weakly through midwicket.
short of a length, pitching on middle and angling away from the right-hander, driven down to long-off for one
dabbed short of cover with soft hands for a single
fuller ball on off stump, driven to long-off for another single
played on the front foot with an open face, Clarke dives to his left at point to save runs
in the blockhole outside off stump, Vincent digs it out to Clarke at point
short of a length ball but fired down leg side, Vincent swivels and tries to pull, wide called
good length on middle and off, Vincent plays on the front foot in front of point for a single
full ball down leg side, Vincent tries to flick and runs it fine to short fine leg
fired in on off stump, Vincent gets well forward and gets hit on the pad
slips down leg side, wide called
defended on teh front foot to the off side
swept from outside off stump behind square leg for a single
driven down to long-off for one more
full ball outside off stump, Vincent gets down on one knee and flasy it through cover
fullish length outside off stump, Fulton leans forward and drives through cover point
full ball outside off stump, Vincent tires a bizarre swat through midwicket and misses
full outside off stump, Vincent waits for it on the front foot and drives to the man on the cover fence
good length ball on off stump, Fulton pushes to mid-off for a single, Lee runs across from mid-on to field it
sjower ball at 129 kmh, Vincent tries to cut on the front foot but is beaten by the lack of pace
full ball on off stump, Vincent dabs it in front of cover for a sharp single
fuller length on off stump, Vincent gets forward and drives to the fielder on the long-off fence
full on the pads this time, Fulton clips it through midwicket
good length ball on middle and off, Vincent gets down and sweeps to fine leg
fuller ball nearly in the blockhole, dug out to mid-on
bowled a touch flatter on off and middle, Fulton plays back and misses the flick
played to deep cover on the back foot
swept down to fine leg for two more, New Zealand are milking the ones and twos with minimum fuss
full toss on off stump, driven to sweeper in the deep
driven to long-off for a single
he pulls the reverse sweep out of the bag to short third man
defended back to the bowler
flatter ball on off and middle stump, defended on the front foot
tossed up on middle and off, Vincent steps forward and defends
played short of Hussey at cover with soft hands
flicks a full ball off his pads behind square for one
full toss outside off stump, Vincent reaches out and pulls it to deep midwicket
bowled flat on leg and middle stump, swept down to fine leg for another single
driven to long-on for one more, New Zealand ticks along nicely
fullish length angling into middle and leg, flicked to midwicket on the front foot
driven to long off on the front foot
played to point on the front foot
full ball on off stump, Fulton leans forward and drives to long off to bring up his fifty, loud cheers from the crowd
tries to reverse sweep one from outside off stump but misses
dropped short of cover on the front foot for one more, four singles in that over
good length ball on middle and off stump, Vincent gets down on one knee and sweeps to deep square leg
slips down leg side, Vincent tries to run it down but the ball hits pad for leg byes to fine leg
driven to deep cover on the front foot
middle and leg stump line again, was that the wrong one? Swept to fine leg for one more
full ball on off stump, Fulton gets on the front foot and thumps it to cover
good length ball outside off stump, driven to long-off for one to end the over
leg-stump line yet again, swept fine for two runs to fine leg
dropped! Fulton drives hard at it to White at cover, he jumped too early and was in no position at all when the ball came to him, how many have they dropped in the series?
beaten outside the off stump, bit of nerves out there suddenly, the ball beat Gilchrist too
pushed through covers on the front foot
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
defended to short cover, Clarke finishes a tight over
fullish outside off stump, Vincent tries to reverse sweep again but hits it to the man at short third man
Vincent thrusts forward and gets an inside edge on to pad for a single to cover
pitches just outside leg and spins into Fulton who moves across and tries to sweep, he misses and the ball goes over leg stump
defended back to the bowler
swept firmly down to deep backward square, Johnson runs across and slides to keep it down to two
slips down leg stump again, Fulton tries to sweep but misses, wide called, Fulton  is exposing leg stump as he moves across his stumps

swept again but this time the timing and placement is perfect, Johnson, as fast as he is, can't reach it and the ball speeds over the deep backward squar eleg fence, 150 partnership between these two now, superb effort
flicked to midwicket
dabbed in front of cover for one

LBW! The sweep does Fulton in. Clarke pitches that just outside off stump, Fulton goes down on one knee and tries to sweep, he misses and the ball hits him just in line of off stump, replays show that the ball would have hit middle and off stump
bowled flat and fast on off stump, defended back to the bowler
Taylor gets off the mark by flicking it to deep square leg
pushed to long-on on the front foot
full and fast on off and middle, pushed to mid-on off the front foot
full, fast and fired down leg side, the ball clips the pad and runs very fine, Gilchrist dives full length and saves four runs
defended to point on the front foot, Vincent sets off for the single, Taylor was struggling to make his ground, and for some reason had his bat tucked under his arm while running
quick delivery at 153 kmh, the line was middle and leg stump and the ball crashed into the pad
defended to the off side on the front foot
good length ball on off stump, Vincent gets forward and defends to midwicket
good length ball on off and middle stump, bowled flat through the air and the batsman gets forward to defend on the  front foot
pushed through covers on the front foot
quick single taken to Hussey at cover, New Zealand have been very good at this today
fired down leg side, clips the pad for a leg bye to short fine leg
sliced in the air over cover, the ball falls safely in the deep and the batsmen run two
angled down leg side again, wide called
full ball on the pads, clipped wide of the fielder at midwicket for one
short of a length ball outside off stump, Vincent unfurls a crisp drive to deep cover
that one is fired into Taylor's blockhole, he gets his bat down in time to play it back to the bowler
banged in short on middle and leg stump, 150kmh, Taylor ducks under it
that's a yorker, a slower one by Tait's standards, 146kmh, Taylor tries to make room but decides to chop down on it, he gets a single on the off side
excellent length on off and middle, Vincent can't find any room to work with and defends back to Tait on the front foot
full ball on off stump, Vincent tries to drive through cover and inside-edges it on to pad
full down leg side, clipped off the toes behind square for a single
good length on off and middle stump, defended into the mid-on region and they scamper a quick single
outstanding timing and placement, Clark let loose a full toss on off and middle, Vincent moved a little towards leg and pushed it firmly past the bowler, the ball beat mid-off and raced to the fence
dabbed between cover and point for a single
short of a length outside off stump, driven to point on the front foot
a fraction short on off and middle stump, Taylor gets forward and clubs it to deep midwicket for a single
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
full ball aimed at the pads at 149 kmh, Taylor tries to swing it through midwicket but misses
full and straight with a hint of swing back into Taylor who gets a faint inside edge on to pad, they run a single to point
full ball in the blockhole outside off stump, squeezed out to Clarke at point

good length ball on off stump swinging into Vincent, he tries to flick but the ball beats him and hits the pad before going on to hit the stumps, Tait gets his reward for an outstanding spell, he's bowled at a terrific pace all day and with much more control
good length ball on off stump, Styris plays back and defends to midwicket
good length ball but the line is drifting on to middle and leg, clipped to Ponting at midwicket and Ponting picke sup and shies at the stumps at the bowler's end
full and in the blockhole, dug out back to the bowler
in the blockhole once more, not much any batsman can do with that, played to mid-off
short of a length on middle and leg stump, Taylor moves across and paddles it to short fine leg
good length ball angling into middle stump, flicked uppishly in front of Ponting at midwicket
full and in the blockhole outside off stump, defended to point

short and wide outside off stump, Styris slams it through extra cover where Ponting didn;t move, he didn;t pick up the ball and all and actually lifted a foot to let it go through, the fielder who relayed the throw on the fence through it over Clark's head and the batsmen run four!
steered to third man for another double
defended to point on the back foot
pitches short outside off stump and angles away from the right-hander, Styris frees his arms and cuts hard but doesn't find the gap at point
fuller ball on leg and middle, Styris works it off his pads to midwicket

Styris backs away and tries to smack it over the straight boundary, he doesn;t hit it out of the middle of the bat but the ball clears the infield and trickles toward the fence, Hussey sprints after it and makes a fine save
good length ball on off stump, Taylor tries to pull but doesn't make proper contact
fantastic ball right in the blockhole, Taylor plays it back to Clark, New Zealand have been tied down after that superb partnership between Vincent and Fulton, you can feel the frustration growing.
full ball on off and middle, Taylor swats it to midwicket where Ponting picks up and fires it at the bowler's end
poor line, drifts outside leg stump and Taylor guides it fine to the fence to bring up the 200 for New Zealand
full ball nearly in the blockhole outside off, Taylor digs it out in front of point for a single
short of a length on off and middle, Styris waits on the back foot and tucks it off his hips to short fine leg
steered down to third man for a single

good length ball on off stump, Taylor pushes it to Clarke and point and sets off for a single, always dangerous to chance a single to Clarke  but this time he misses the stumps, Taylor would have been home in any case
defended to Clarke on the front foot
short of a length on middle and off stump, Styris backs away and cuts down to third man
fuller ball on off stump, Taylor pushes straight to Ponting at cover and takes off, Ponting was looking up at the batsman and hence failed to field it cleanly
fuller ball on off stump, swinging away from Styris who triees to heave it over the leg side but misses

full ball on the pads, Taylor lofts in the air to deep midwicket, Hodge covers a lot of ground, so much ground in so little time and dives full length to his left, he manages to geta  hand on it but can;t hold on, fabulous effort
defended on the off side on the front foot
bowled him! Clarke bowls that fast and a fraction shorter on off stump, Taylor makes a little bit of room and tries to play the slog sweep, he misses and Clarke hits
fullish ball on the pads, Oram turns it off his legs for a single behind square
bowled quick and fast on leg stump, Styris tries to flick but misses
defended on the front foot to covers
pushed to midwicket on the back foot for a single
full and wide outside off stump, Styris uses the width to drive to Hodge at deep cover
full ball on off stump, driven to Ponting at cover
short of a length and angling away from Styris who lashes it over cover on the front foot for a single
good length ball on off stump, Oram is caught in his crease and chops down at it, he gets an inside edge past leg stump
short of a length on leg stump, Styris flicks it off his hips down to fine leg
flat ball on off and middle stump, Clarke is cramping the batsman for room, driven to cover for a quick single, had there been a direct hit at the batsman's end, Oram would have been short
pitches outside off stump, Oram seizes his chance and plays the reverse sweep, he uses the angle to play it really fine and times it well enough to reach the fence
uses his feet to step down and drive to long-on for one
driven through covers for a single
Oram plays the reverse sweep yet again, this time he took it from off stump and middle and played it to short fine leg
pushed into covers on the front foot
and Oram sends him high and far over the straight boundary, he moved his front leg out of the way and hammered it down the ground
Lee comes back well, Oram tries to run it to third man but gets beaten outside the off stump

caught at deep midwicket! Huge huge wicket for Australia, Lee banged it in short and Oram pulled it powerfully, that man Hodge again covers good ground and dives low to his left to take a sharp catch, he's delighted and the Aussies run to mob him, they know the importance of that wicket
Lee over-steps and bowls that short of a length, McCullum tries to pull but doesn't time it well
fullish length on middle and leg, whipped down to deep square leg
full toss on of and middle, swinging into the right-hander, Styris plays it back to Lee
Lee fires in the yorker to end the over, Styris digs it out back to the bowler
off and middle stump line, McCullum gets forward and defends back to Clarke
pushed through covers for a single
full and fast on off stump, driven to cover
flicked off the pads through midwicket
driven to long-off for one more, Ponting won't mind the singles
pushed wide of point on the front foot for a single to end the over, just four off it
full ball in the blockhole on leg stump, Styris squeezes it out to fine leg for a single
full and fast, fired down leg side at 150kmh, Gilchrist dives to his left to save a certain four, the run a single
Lee over-steps again and Styris pulls him in front of midwicket, he's placed that superbly and will get four
full toss on leg stump, Styris moves away and hits it down to long-on for one
another full toss on leg stump, McCullum backs away and hits straight, he gets two runs down the ground
full again on middle and leg stump, McCullum flicks to midwicket for a single, White misfields and the batsmen runs one more, White thought about which end to throw at before he picked up the ball
smack that! McCullum makes room and smashes it down the ground to the long-on fence, 17 off the over so far and one more ball to go
full on middle and leg yet again, McCullum makes room and drives to long-off for a single to end the over
full ball on middle stump, McCullum gets under it and lofts over midwicket, the ball falls safe in the deep and he gets two runs
another full ball on the pads, McCullum hoists it over midwicket and once more finds the gap in the outfield, Hodge fumbles on the fence and the batsmen run three
streaky four but Styris will take it, he tried to heave it down the ground and a thick edge flew fine to the third man fence
Clark finds the blockhole and Styris keeps it out and gets a single behind square on the leg side via an inside edge
full toss on of stump, McCullum smashes it down to long-off for a single
full toss on middle and leg stump, Styris hits it well off his pads but picks out Hussey at deep midwicket, Hussey takes a relatively simple catch and New Zealand are six down
good length ball angling into middle and leg stump, Vettori backs away and dabs it to point for one
fuller length on leg stump, McCullum drives to long on for  a single
full ball outside of stump, Vettori moves outside the off stump as well and clips it behind square for  asingle, curious shot

good length ball on off stump, McCullum tries to scoop it over the wicketkeeper and got hit on the body, Vettori set off for the leg bye, McCullum sends him back, Lee picks up the balla nd fires it at the bowler's end, he misses the stumps and concedes an overthrow
hits the pad for a leg bye behind square on the on side
full ball on off stump, McCullum hits it along the ground to long-on for a single
outstanding yorker, right up there in the blockhole, McCullum tries to hit it down the ground and the ball squeezes under his bat and rattles leg stump
Clark over-steps and Franklin swats a fullish ball to long-off for two runs
full ball on off stump, Franklin throws his bat at it and slices it in the air and over point
massive massive blow, Franklin stands his ground and hits through the line, he gets superb elevation and the ball flies over the long-on fence
Clark tries to find the blockhole, Franklin drives down the ground and calls for two
fullish ball outside off stump, sliced over point for a single, Vettori wanted to go for the second but Franklin sent him back

full ball just outside off stump, Vettori moved across to off stump and tried to flick, he missed and Gilchrist collected the ball, he under-arms the ball at the stumps and the batsmen steal a bye after the ball hits the stumps

inn2.comm: good length ball outside the off stump, Gilchrist lets it go through to McCullum
too full from Franklin, Gilchrist leans bak and drills it through cover and the ball scorches the turf as it races to the fence
full toss on off and middle, Gilchrist hits it down between mid-on and mid-off, Vettori dives from mid-off to keep them down to one
good length ball on off stump, Hayden gets forward and drives, he gets an inside edge on to the pad and back to the bowler
fuller length on off stump, Hayden steps down and drives past Franklin
full length, searching for the blockhole, Gilchrist waits for it and plays it late on the off side
pitches outside off stump and moves further away from the left-hander, wide called
he gets it straighter this time, Hayden leans forward and pushes to cover
pitches outside off stump and angles away from Hayden who lets it go
seams away from Hayden after pitching outside off, he lets it go through to McCullum again
full ball on off stump, pushed back past the bowler for a single
good length ball on off stump, Gilchrist moves on the back foot and pushes it past Styris at short cover
a touch on the fuller side on leg and middle stump, Gilchrist gets back and drives to mid-on
pitched up ball on leg stump, Hayden steps down the track and powers the drive past mid-on, no stopping that shot
slower ball on off stump, Hayden gets forward again and drives to cover
pitches on a good length outside off stump, Hayden shoulders arms
hits a good length just outside off stump and shapes back into Hayden who gets forward and plays it back to Franklin

wild wild swing from Hayden. Franklin bowled that a touch shorter outside off stump, Hayden advanced down the pitch and aimed to hit it over midwicket, the ball swung back into him and beat the bat, McCullum dived to his right and made a sharp save
pitches just outside off stump and cuts back into Hayden who lets it go through to McCullum
short of  alength ball on middle and off, Gilchrist moves back in his crease and defends
slower ball from Bond bowled just short of a length, Gilchrist was very early on the pull short and was beaten comprehensively by the change of pace
another slower ball on off stump, Gilchrist was early on the shot again and spooned it uppishly towards mid-off
a touch fuller on leg and middle, Gilchrist works it wide of the Gillespie at mid-on for  two more
banged in short and this time Gilchrist times the pull to perfection, he gets back in a flash and slams it over midwicket to the fence
full ball on the pads and Gilchrist pushes it wide of Gillespie who dives to his left at mid-on, he gets a hand on it and the batsmen run two
short of a length ball outside off stump, Hayden flat-bats it to mid-off for a single
good length ball angling into middle and leg, driven to mid-on for one
good length once again on off and middle, Hayden plants his foot forward and defends towards cover
too straight from Franklin, slanting into middle and leg stump, Hayden uses the angle and pulls it over midwicket for another boundary
too straight again, Hayden moves forward and across to flick it to Taylor at deep midwicket, Taylor fumbles the pick up but the batsman don't run another
steered to point on the back foot
pitches on a good length on off stump and slants away from the left-hander, Hayden lets it go
full and fast at 146kmh, looking to hit the blockhole, driven to extra cover
short of a length angling away from Hayden who punches to mid-off for a sharp single
pushed to mid-on off the back foot for a single, Vettori is deep on the inner circle
good length on middle and off stump, Hayden gets forward and gets squared up, he plays it to cover point
short of a length on leg and middle, Hayden moves forward once again and forces it in front of midwicket for a single
short of a length outside off stump, Hayden thumps it to cover off the front foot
Hayden gets forward again to one thats pitched outside off stump, he tries to drive but gets a thick edge to mid-on
short of a length outside off stump, angling into Gilchrist who moves forward and punches to cover
good length ball on off stump, Gilchrist stands his ground and tries to biff it past mid-on, he didn't time it well enough
fuller length on off stump, Gilchrist moves forward and across and drives, the bat turns in his hand and they run a quick single to mid-on
short of a length outside off stump, Hayden waits on the back foot this time and cuts to point
full toss outside off stump, that's too easy for Gilchrist who leans forward and places the cover drive superbly,
fullish length on middle and leg, played to wide mid-on for a single
slower ball at 127 kmh, full outside off stump, Hayden waits for it and dabs it in front of point for  a single
good length ball on off stump, Gilchrist drives on the up, short cover gets a hand on it and they run a quick single to cover
pushed on the front foot to Vettori who is right on the edge of the circle at mid-on
another slower ball and Gilchrist was foxed, he played the drive too early and the ball flew wide of Fleming at short cover
on the shorter side outside off stump, Hayden cuts and places it in front of point, he hasn't timed it well enough to get four, they complete the third with ease
a touch too straight on middle and leg but the length was good, Gilchrist leans forward and drives past the bowler for a single
short of a length on off stump, Hayden tries to throw Franklin off his line by advancing down the pitch and backing away, he tries to hit it over cover but gets a thick bottom edge
driven on the front foot to cover
a half-volley outside off stump, Hayden leans into the cover drive but hits it to Fleming at short cover
short of a length and wide outside off stump, Hayden steps out and lunges at the ball, trying to power it down the ground, the ball hits the bottom of the bat and Hayden gets a single to mid-on
perfect line and length from Bond, just outside off stump, Hayden lets it go watchfully, Bond had over-stepped so he'll have to try and re-bowl that same ball
good length once again on off stump, Hayden defends to cover
full ball on off stump, Hayden gets forward and punches to mid-off for one
a fraction short and that's all Gilchrist needs, he stands his ground and muscles it over midwicket, he;s timed it superbly and the ball bounces over the fence
pushed to mid-off for a quick single
good length ball on off stump, Hayden leans forward and defends to cover
short of  alength on middle stump, Hayden turns it of his pads in front of midwicket for a single
short and wide outside the off stump, Hayden moves forward and cuts, Oram moves to his right and saves runs at point
full ball, nearly in the blockhole on off and middle stump, Hayden comes down hard at it and forces it to midwicket
short of  a length on off stump, Gilchrist plays it in front of Oram at point and calls for a wuick single, the ones and twos are coming at ease
short of  alength again outside off stump, angling into Hayden who moves forward and but the weight on the back foot to cut it to third man
driven hard to mid-on who was deep in the inner circle, he hit that too hard to chance the single
bowled him! Franklin jumps in joy as Gilchrist misses a heave over midwicket and gets a thick inside edge on to his stumps, rash shot that because he tried to fetch that from outside off stump
drifts down leg side, Hayden clips it off his pads but can't beat the fielder at short fine leg
short of  alength ball outside off stump, Ponting gets a long stride in and drives on the up to cover, beautiful stroke for no run
driven right out of the middle of the bat, Ponting gets forward and eases the drive on the up to cover
fuller length on off stump, Ponting moves forward once more but this time he gets an inside edge on to the pad
superb shot to get off the mark, Ponting plants hit front foot forward to one thats a touch too full, he hits through the line and lofts it down the ground for four
played to point on the front foot
good length ball pitching on middle and angling across Ponting who gets forward and defends to cover
full length on off stump, Ponting once again is quick to get on the front foot and drive, he collects a single to mid-off
short of a length outside off stump, that bounced sharply on Hayden who missed the cut, McCullum completes a sharp save
defended to mid-on off the back foot
a touch wide outside off stump, Hayden cuts to the left of Oram at point and gets two
dropped a fraction short and Hayden pulls and pulls hard, he hit that flat and straight down Taylor's throat at deep midwicket, he hardly had to move and completes an easy catch
fullish length angling into middle stump, Ponting moves forward and across and plays it to midwicket
sublime placement, Gillespie drops in a touch short outside off stump, Ponting leans on the back foot and drives between point and cover, so easy on the eyes is Ponting
Gillespie greets Clarke with a bouncer, the batsman ducks under it
fuller length on off stump, Clarke pushes to mid-on and sprints through for a single, excellent running for the man at mid-off was a touch too deep
mid-on is also deep and Ponting dabs it past the bowler for another sharp single
good length bal angling into of fand middle stump, Clarke moves across on the front foot and defends to midwicket
driven on the front foot to mid-on, no single this time
full length angling across Ponting from over the wicket, driven on the front foot to cover
excellent length, Ponting got on the front foot and Franklin bowled it just short of a length, the ball bounced a bit more and beat Ponting's drive
Ponting replies and how! He moves forward and hits through the line, he's timed that impeccably and the ball bounces just short of the ropes
driven to point on the front foot
short of a length on middle and off, Ponting lunges forward and pushes to mid-on, Clarke sets off but changes his mind and then decides to go for it, he had to scurry to make his ground
good length ball outside off stump, Ponting tries to cut but gets beaten
good length angling into Ponting's off and middle stump, defended on the front foot
that's not that short outside the off stump, Ponting is quick to move back and cut to third man for a single
full ball on off stump, Clarke leans forward and drives to cover
slower ball, 126.8 kmh, and in the block hole, Clarke digs it out towards cover
short of a length angling into middle and leg stump, Clarke leans across on the front foot and closes the face of the bat to play it to point

short ball outside the off stump, Ponting latches on to the length and square-drives it through the off side, he hasn't timed it perfectly and the outfield is on the slower side so he'll get three for that stroke
defended towards cover on the front foot
short of a length, angling into Clarke's body, he chips that in the air but safely over midwicket, Vettori slides and relays it to Franklin but he throws it wide of him and concedes the third
good length outside off stump, Ponting gets his front foot forward and lets it go
just short of a length and Ponting gets into position to pull in unbelieveably quick time, he hits that well but Vincent makes a fine save at midwicket
dabbed towards point for a single, Clarke hesitated a bit but Ponting called him through very quickly
full toss outside off stump at 137 kmh, driven to the front foot to mid-off
superb timing and placement, Ponting gets forward and laces it between cover and point for a couple of runs
banged in short and Ponting rocks back to pull in front of square.
overpitched outside off, driven straight to cover
slower bouncer! Had Clarke in a fix. To hook or to duck was the question. In the end he did both! And doesn't get a touch
fast bouncer this time and left alone
Ponting charges out like a mad bull, Oram slips in a slower one and the ball evades the flashing blade and goes just over the middle stump line
fuller, on the off stump line, Ponting's bat comes down in an angle and he drives it to midon
Now Clarke gets a single with drive to the on side
Swat! On a length, outside the off stump, Ponting cross-bats it to deep square leg
Clarke backs away a touch, the ball follows him, he is cramped, just pushes it out to cover region
overpitched, driven to mid-on. He goes hard at it and ends up closing the bat-face and hence doesn't derive timing
just short of driveable length, outside off, Ponting shapes for a full blooded drive, changes tack, opens the bat-face runs it to point
Sliced away! Fullish, outside off, Ponting carves it, in the air, through point. NZ have a backward point and it flies to his right
length-delivery, outside off, punched away to the off side.
almost swatted to mid-on! Banged in short, outside off, Clarke hops up, reaches out and plays a fore-hand cross court to right of Vettori at mid-on
from wide of the crease, full, outside off, driven to cover
slap! Ponting leans forward and just spanks a slightly short of length delivery on the off and middle to the right of mid-on.
bowled a bit short on off stump, Clarke waits on the back foot and cuts past point
bowled flat and a touch short outside of stump, Ponting goes back and flat-bats it down to long-off, Clarke runs well and completes the second easily, australia bring up their 100
cut on the back foot through point
on the shoeter side again, Clarke plays back and drives to long-on
fuller this time, floated through on off stump, Ponting strides forward and defends
blocked towards cover on the front foot, Vettori makes a tidy start but he needs to be a little fuller
short of a length on off stump, Clarke hits it hard down the ground and doesn't time it well, gets a single to mid-on
a half-volley on off stump and Ponting dispatches it with an imperious drive, he hit  through the line and lofted it straight back over the bowler's end
played to point with an open face of the bat
short of a length outside off, Ponting drives on the up through cover and gets two more
good length on off stump, Ponting moves forward and plays it to point
a fraction short and Ponting swings that from outside off stump through midwicket for a single
bowled flat and quick on off stump, Ponting stays back and defends to cover
tossed up teasingly on off and middle, Ponting leans forward and turns it off the pads for a single
defended back to the bowler on the front foot

caught behind! Clarke reaches out for a very wide ball and tries to cut, he should have left that for it would have most certainly been wide, he gets the toe end of the bat on it and McCullum takes a sharp catch
short and wide outside off stump, Hodge reaches out and cuts to point
Hodge gets off the mark by turning it off his pads to square leg, the fans give him a roar
fullish length outside off stump, Hodge plays it in front of point for a single
short of a length outside off stump, Ponting lunges forward and opens the face to run it to third man
cut to point off the back foot
a gentle 115 kmh on a good length on off stump, Hodge gets behind the line and defends
quicker this time at 127 kmh, Hodge plays it short of cover on the back foot and runs a quick single
Ponting plays forward and reaches out for one that's wide outside off, he opens the face and guides it to point
tossed up slowly on off stump, Hodge reaches out for it and gets a thickish edge to short third man
full ball on middle stump, pushed through midwicket for a single
tossed up on off stump, Ponting leans forward and punches through cover
defended on the back foot back to the bowler
Vettori strays down leg side, wide called
bowled fuller on off stump, Hodge plays back and makes room to cut to point
this time he places the cut shot well and collects a single to deep point
short of a length at 125 kmh on off stump, Hodge leans forward and drives to mid-off
a touch too short this time on off stump, Hodge stands tall on the back foot and plays it wide of point for a single
that hit a good length and stopped on Ponting a bit, Ponting played a bit too early and the ball hit high on the bat and went in the air and just wide of Styris
defended to midwicket on the front foot
a touch fuller and on middle stump, Ponting closes the face and plays it behind square for two
pushed with soft hands in front of cover for a single to end the over
bowled flat and fast on middle stump, that was the straighter one, Ponting goes back and drives bacdk to the bowler
defended on the front foot on the off side
Ponting gets forward and dabs it in front of cover with gentle hands, Vincent was a bit slow to react at cover and Hodge makes his ground
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
bowled quickly through the air on middle stump, Hodge gets behind the line and blocks
Vettori over-steps and bowls a good length on middle stump, Hodge defends on the front foot
cut through point off the back foot for a single, just three runs off that over
fullish length on middle and leg, turned off the pads behind square for  asingle
Ponting pushes down to long-on off the front foot to bring up his fifty, he's looked very confident out there and he holds the key to Australia's chances tonight
played down to short third man with an open face
a touch too short and much too wide outside off stump, Ponting waits on the back foot and cuts down to third man
dabbed with gentle hands in front of point for a single
fuller length on off stump, Ponting plays back and drives firmly to Fleming who makes a diving save at cover
floated through outside off stump, Hodge tries to cut but gets more of an edge to short third man
pushed wide of midwicket for a single
full and wide outside off stump, Ponting drives through covers for one more
dragged short outside the off stump, Hodge waits for it and cuts easily to the man on the point fence
tossed up on middle and leg stump, Ponting chips that inside out down to long-off for one
Hodge leans on the front foot and pushes it through midwicket, Vettori gives chase and ensures that they run just the single
good length on off stump, Hodge stands his ground and defends towards cover
fuller ball with a hint of swing back into middle stump, Hodge tries to drive on the off side but gets an inside edge to midwicket
fullish length on off, Hodge gets forward and drives back to Styris
full toss on middle stump, Hodge pushes it down to long-on for one more, there hasn't been a boundary hit in a while
full again on the pads, Ponting clips it through midwicket
a touch short in length just outside the off, Hodge opens the face to run it down to third man, just the three singles off the over
full ball on off stump, Hodge drives through covers for a single
tossed up delightfully on off stump, Ponting has no option but to defend on the front foot
pushed to covers on the front foot
Ponting plays it to point on the front foot, there's a mix-up in the running but a mis-field allows the single
cut to point on the back foot
bowled slowly through the air on off and middle, Hodge plays back and works it through midwicket
defended to point, the pressure mounts with every dot ball
fullish length on off stump, Hodge plays forward and guides it to point
that's three dot balls in a row, Hodge turns it off his pads to midwicket
dabbed off the front foot to short third man for a quick single
fullish length on off stump, Ponting leans forward and whips it through midwicket, classy shot but just the single
good length ball on off stump, Hodge drives down to long on for one more, Hodge has hit 19 singles in his innings so far
Vettori loses control and sends it wide outside off stump
Hodge sweeps one past short fine leg and gets two runs, that's his first scoring shot that's not a single
punched off the back foot through covers for one
defended on the back foot towards cover
Ponting uses his feet to one that's floated on middle adn leg, he drives down to long on for a single
cut past point on the back foot for one more
Vettori over-steps again and Ponting chips it down to long-off for a two runs off the bat plus one for the no-ball
beaten by the flight but Ponting still goes through with the loft over midwicket, the ball falls well short of the man in the deep
short of a length on middle stump, flicked behind square for a single
tight line and length on off stump, defended with a straight bat back to the bowler
Ponting breaks the shackles after 12 overs! He picks it up superbly off the toes and flicks it in the air and through the gap at deep midwicket, four precious runs for Australia
defended on the front foot, rather awkwardly for he was not to to the pitch of the ball at all
flicked off his pads behind square, he;s placed it well enough to get two
good length on off stump, driven firmly back to the bowler, Styris gets a hand on it and the ball trickles past the stumps
short and wide outside off stump, Hodge cuts to deep point for a single
turned around the corner to short fine leg for a quick single, good call from Hodge, nice and early
Hodge uses his feet to come down the track and drive through covers, he's timed that nicely and gets three to Gillespie on the cover fence
cut past point for a single
Hodge tries to play it behind square on the leg side by closing the face but misses, he gets hit on the pad
defended to cover on the front foot
full ball on off stump, Ponting gets forward and drives firmly to Fleming at cover
slower ball at 126 kmh, Ponting lunged forward and was beaten by the change of pace, he went through with the shot and chipped it down to long-on
short of a length on off and middle, defended on the back foot back to the bowler
short and wide outside off stump, Hodge cuts and times it well, is that going to be his first boundary? Yesy it is, loud cheers from the crowd as the ball reaches the fence
guided down to third man for a single
fullish length on off stump, Ponting drives to cover on the front foot
Hodge steps down the pitch to Vettori, realises he isn't to the pitch of the ball and gets his pad in the way
Hodge gets on theback foot and cuts in front of point
driven through covers on the front foot for another single
dabbed to point for a quick single, the throw was poor from Taylor, had it been direct or closer to the stumps, Ponting was a goner
catch that is the cry but that's only in theory, Ponting came down the track and smashed that in the air and through Vettori's legs for four to the straight boundary, that was hit very very hard
tries to sweep but is beaten by the change in pace, that was only 74kmh
short and wide outside the off stump, Hodge tries to run it fine to third man and gets a controlled edge down to the fence
full ball on the pads, worked through square leg for a single
good length from bond outside off stump, Ponting gets forward and pushes it to point for a single
Bond drops it a short and Hodge pulls to deep midwicket for single, Bond's length is all over the shop
that's far better, a slower ball on a tight line and length around off stump, Ponting gets forward and defends back to the bowler
too full outside off stump, Ponting pushes off the front foot through cover point for a single, eight runs off that over
good length on off stump, Ponting gets forward and blocks
Ponting takes a step down, Vettori spotted him and beat him in the flight, defended back to the bowler
pushed towards cover on the front foot
Ponting reaches out for one outside off stumpa nd closes the face to play it into the vacant midwicket area, Vettori chases the ball to midwicket and the batsmen run two
huge huge hit from Ponting, he gets down the track and to the pitch of the ball, the ball doesn't turn much and finds the middle of the bat, it sails high over the long-on fence
Ponting drives through cover for more runs, Vettori ends his spell with an expensive over
short ball on off stump, Hodge backs away and cuts over McCullum for four runs, Australia are timing this chase nicely now
half-volley on the pads, Hodge flicks through midwicket for two more
width offered outside the off stump and Hodge cuts to third man again, that's seven runs off the first three balls
full ball on leg stump, terribel line from Bond, Ponting moves across and flicks behind square for two more
driven to cover on the front foot, that was far better line and length from Bond
isn't he batting well, that ball stopped on him outside the off stump, Ponting was early on the front foot and waited until teh ball got to him and then ran it to third man, he moves on to 91
he lets loose a high full toss outside off stump, McCullum was standing up to the stumps and does well to collect it, no-ball called
short ball on leg stump, pulled to deep backward square leg
driven through covers and Hodge brings up his fifty, loud cheers ring around the MCG, he's settled in nicely after a nervy start
full ball driven down to long off
fullish length outside off stump, Hodge tries to squeeze it through point but misses
full and wide outside off stump, Hodge reaches out for it and drives to the man on the cover fence
short of a length on leg stump, poor line, Ponting can do this in his sleep, he works that wide of the fielder at short fine leg for two more
pushed into the covers for a very quick single
full ball on middle and leg stump, driven to long-on for a single
bowled into the blockhole, Hodge squeezes it down the ground for one more
full and straight for Oram, Ponting is quick to get on the front foot and drive down the ground for another single
dragged short and on leg stump, you can't bowl there if your fine leg is in the circle, Hodge swings it over the man in the circle and down to the fence
driven firmly through covers for more runs, three in fact, Hodge moves on to 60 off just 64 balls
full and in the slot outside off stump, Hodge gets his front foot out of the way and slams it through covers for four more, superb timing, another four at the start of an over
full again outside off stump, Hodge bashes it at cover but doesn't find the gap
Hodge is moving ahead at full steam now, that was full again, Hodge picks upt he length and hits handsomely through the line, the ball clears the long-on fence by some distance
Hodge tries to bash it again but gets beaten
pushed in front of point for a single
slips down leg side, Ponting moves across and gets a bit of pad on it for a leg bye behind square
driven to long-off on the front foot for a single
fullish length on off stump, Hodge plays it to midwicket
full toss on off stump, Hodges reaches out for it and drives through cover for two more
full ball on off stump, Hodge drives to wide mid-off and Vettori runs across from cover and does the fielding
full ball on the pads, clipped off the pads through midwicket for two more
hundred for Ponting, he reaches it by driving down to long-on, an outstanding knock, he's hardly put a foot wrong today and has controlled this daunting run-chase perfectly
good length ball on off and middle, Ponting pushes it back towards the bowler, Gillespie tries to get to the ball and ends up pushing Hodge all over the place
full toss outside off stump, Ponting slices it past point for a single
full and straight, Ponting moves forward and drives to long-on for one
full toss on off stump, Hodge drives it straight to cover and runs the single, he'd have been out if the throw had hit the stumps at the bowler's end
full ball nearly in the blockhole, pushed to long-on for a single
full outside off stump, driven into the covers for one more
full ball angling into middle and leg, Hodge slogs it through midwicket and places it superbly, Franklin dives desperately on the fence but can't save it, Fleming is stony-faced
Hodge backs away to make room and cuts fine to third man, that was a no-ball because it was a full toss above waist
driven to, long-on for one more
pushed to cover on the front foot for yet another single
pushed to midwicket for one more run
defended on the front foot to point, what's that? A dot ball?
played with soft hands down to long-off for a single
caught in the deep! Ponting slams it down the ground to long-off, he hit that right out of the screws, Vincent sprinted in from the fence, dived forward and took an excellent low catch
full outside off stump, Hodge drives through covers and calls for two, he gets them as well, he moves on to 86
Hodge walks out of his crease and thumps it through cover, just the single this time
Gillespie fires it into the blockhole, Hussey pushes to long-on for a single
full and nearly in the blockhole, Hodge clips it off his pads for a single to deep square leg
full ball drifting on to the pads once again, Hussey flicks behind square for another single
chipped down to long-on for a single, that got to the fielder on one bounce
fullish length outside off stump, Hodge powers it down the gorund to long off for  a single
full toss on off stump, Hussey lofts it over cover and places it to perfection, he splits the gap in the deep

Hussey is run-out, Hussey drove that into the deep cover region, he called for the second and took off from the non-striker's end, Hodge sent him back, the throw was flat and powerful from Vincent in the deep and Oram broke the stumps with Hussey just short
full toss outside off stump and a no-ball to boot, terrible stuff from Oram, Hodge drives through covers and find sthe gap, four more
Hodge steers it down to third man for two more, he is on 95 and Australia need just five more
Hodge drives and beats the fielder at cover, he runs two to the man in the deep, he's on 97 but will not be on strike, Australia need just three more
White pulls it down to fine leg for the single, Hodge has his chance

that's the victory! Hodge drives through point and shouts "wait", once he sees the ball beat the infield he sets off for the double, he finishes on 99, pity he didn't get his hundred but I doubt he'll care too much, it's been a fantastic innings from him
